fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 13.85 points or 0.07% to settle at 19,646.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 3.59% to 10.14. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries and Tata Power Company were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
